sentences.english: Propolis is a natural resin found in the young buds of trees.
sentences.chinese: 蜂膠是一種天然樹脂發現，在年輕的樹芽。

sentences.english: Propolis may help treat food poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 蜂膠或有助於防範食物中毒。

sentences.english: Results The content of total flavones was the highest in the propolis from Shandong.
sentences.chinese: 結果山東產的蜂膠中總黃酮的含量最高。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the people of many civilized countries used propolis as medicine to treat inflammations.
sentences.chinese: 自古以來，蜂膠被用作天然消炎藥物。

sentences.english: The ancient Egyptians prized propolis as an embalming agent.
sentences.chinese: 古埃及人將蜂膠珍視爲一種防腐劑。

sentences.english: Bees produce a compound called propolis from the sap on needle-leaved trees or evergreens.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂利用針葉樹或常綠植物的汁液製造蜂膠化合物。

sentences.english: They strip it with their mandibles and pack it into the pollen baskets on their legs.
sentences.chinese: 它用上顎把蜂膠剝下來，把它放進它腿上的花粉籃裏。

sentences.english: Propolis-Ethylcellulose Microsphere (PEMS) was prepared with physical chemistry method.
sentences.chinese: 採用液中乾燥法制備了蜂膠乙基纖維素微球。

sentences.english: Pure Active Manuka Honey enhanced with New Zealand Propolis powder and extract.
sentences.chinese: 純麥盧卡蜂蜜主動加強與新西蘭蜂膠粉和提取物。

sentences.english: Ethylcellulose( EC ) was used as wall materials to prepare EC- propolis microcapsules, by the physical chemistry method.
sentences.chinese: 以乙基纖維素爲囊材，採用物理化學法制備蜂膠微囊。

sentences.english: Conclusion Compound propolis cream is an external preparation with better security.
sentences.chinese: 結論複方蜂膠乳膏是一種安全性較好的外用製劑。

sentences.english: Objective To provide references for the further study of Propolis .
sentences.chinese: 目的爲進一步研究甘肅產蜂膠提供參考。

sentences.english: Determination of two ingredients in compound articaine hydrochloride injection by HPLC method;
sentences.chinese: 建立蜂膠中抗腫瘤成分阿替匹林的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Enriched with Lanolin, Bee Propolis a natural healing agent and Royal Jelly for skin health.
sentences.chinese: 內含羊毛脂，自然抗生蜂膠和蜂皇漿讓皮膚更健康。

definition: liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4

definition: to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
